{{velocity}} {{html wiki="true"}}
## "object" and "action" can be set already if the page is included from NewDemarche #if (!$object) #set ($object = $doc.getObject('Demarches.Code.DemarchesClass')) #set ($action = $xcontext.action) #end #if ($action == 'edit') #set ($type = 'edit') ## Groovy script to validate empty title or empty direction #end #if ($xcontext.validationStatus && ($xcontext.validationStatus.errors.size() > 0 || $xcontext.validationStatus.exceptions.size() > 0)) {{error}} $services.localization.render('demarches.validation.error') #if ($xcontext.validationStatus.exceptions.size() > 0) #foreach ($exception in $xcontext.validationStatus.exceptions) $exception #end #end {{/error}} #end
